title: Bug 20249[Help] Change editor/view/perspective F1 help
OB: When the change editor menu is open (Build F2), pressing F1 displays some help. However, the help window closes immediately, preventing the user from reading the contents.
EB: When the change editor menu is open (Build F2) and F1 is pressed, the help window should stay open, allowing the user to read the contents.
SR:
1. Open the change editor menu (Build F2).
2. Press F1 to display help.
3. Observe that the help window closes immediately, hindering the ability to read the contents.
